Bulma Strap

BULMA STRAP

Additional Small Library Using jQuery 3 and Bootstrap Javascript Library

Foreword


So You Chose Bulma, But Something Missing Right ?, Yes Like The Author Said

There is no JavaScript included. People generally want to use their own JS implementation (and usually already have one). Bulma can be considered "environment agnostic": it's just the style layer on top of the logic.

The Missing Component Is Drop Down Button, And Tab Content
